official-title.#text:

text.#text:
identify and
			 describe every program administered by the agency;

for each such
			 program—

determine the
			 total administrative costs of the program;

determine the
			 expenditures for services for the program;

estimate the
			 number of clients served by the program and beneficiaries who received

estimate—

the

the

			 contract, a cooperative agreement, or another form of financial award or
			 assistance) who assist in administering the program; and

identify programs
			 within the agency with duplicative or overlapping missions, services, and
			 allowable uses of funds.
